title: Oscar's greatest moments, 1971-1991
creator_credit: Jeff Margolis and Academy of Motion Picture Arts and Sciences
brief_description: An anthology of Hollywood’s biggest stars, funniest moments, famous speeches, glamourous and outrageous fashions, lavish production numbers, most popular songs, and legendary Honourary Award recipients - 21 years of show-stopping magic and excitement. Hosted by Karl Malden, this extraordinary documentary compiles the most memorable highlights from 21 years of televised Academy Awards.
